snippet: Ms. Paar is remembered by many 1950s and ’60s television viewers as the cute, precocious girl whom her father, the late-night talk-show host Jack Paar, introduced to a national audience.
abstract: Randy Paar, daughter and guest of talk-show host Jack Paar, dies at age 63.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Paar is remembered by many 1950s and ’60s television viewers as the cute, precocious girl whom her father, the late-night talk-show host Jack Paar, introduced to a national audience.

headline.seo: Randy Paar, Talk-Show Host’s Daughter and Guest, Dies at 63
headline.main: Randy Paar, Talk-Show Host’s Daughter and Guest, Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Randy Paar, 63, Talk-Show Host’s Daughter and Guest
